algorithm_technique: Dynamic programming with frequency and prefix sum tracking for consecutive subsequences.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the sum of values of all consecutive subsequences (increasing or decreasing by 1) in an array.
problem_summary_technical: Uses DP with frequency and prefix sum maps to efficiently count and sum consecutive subsequences ending at each element.
key_insights: This problem is similar to sum-of-consecutive-subarrays but deals with subsequences, requiring a DP approach.
The DP state needs to track the count of consecutive subsequences ending at a number and their total sum.
The logic involves extending existing consecutive subsequences by adding the current number, considering both +1 and -1 differences.
